title: Dance Your Pants Off 0.7.1b -iamramen
description:
Dance Yo Pants Off mix version 0.7.1b
by

|  ||  _  |        |   _|  _  |        |  -__|     |
|__||___._|__|__|__|__| |___._|__|__|__|_____|__|__|


(length --> 4:55:04)



This is still a beta version (thus the 0.7.1b) but there have been some major changes since the last-released iteration. Since people seem to be overwhelmed by my "nightly builds", this will be the last release 'till 0.8.0b.

Feel free to leave comments and suggestions as to how this mix can be bettered. I'm always open to advice (as long as you're not an ass about it). I realize this is a ridiculously long mix, so maybe suggest the several songs you find least suitable; or several songs you think should be added in to replace others...


***NOTE***

I _HIGHLY_ recommend you listen to the mix before reading the included .pdf song list. It will make the whole experience much more enjoyable and maybe even a bit surprising.

***NOTE***

Plan of Attack:

0.8.0b - this will be down to 4 hours with almost all song selections made permanent.

0.9.0b - there will be three distinct sections: a "Warm Up", a "Work Out", and a "Cool Down"; each roughly 80 minutes in length.

1.0.0 - this will be uploaded as three separate folders, each able to fit on a CD. Each folder will contain split tracks that together make up one of the sections. All CDs and tracks should still be played together in order, because they will remain continuous.
